short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab with a customizable features and Zen Mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are just one tab away from zen with the ZenGuru extension. The Zen Guru tab comes packed with a suite a productivity features. When you need to take a mental break tap on Zen Mode and relax with meditative videos in between tabs. Other features include managing your bookmarks,  taking notes, and your own To Do List. Other features include quick links, History,  and easy access to Chrome Applications

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service. The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
